This game is actually pretty amazing in my own opinion, it actually feels like an adventure on going to many different places outside rather than being an inside room of testing chambers and facing the challenges in the game. If you already have Portal, then I'll highly recommend that you go buy this game. It's worth the game, especially if you're a fan of the Portal Series and if you want co-op with a friend, also to have fun with community test chambers by people in the Steam Workshop. I'll rate this game 10/10

Portal 2 i would definitley reccommend, it is a great game with a fantastic singleplayer and hilarious co-op. The community chambers are also very fun, the acheivements funny (names and whatnot) and if it is a puzzle game you want, portal 2 does have a puzzle element to it. it can get tricky at times, but i think it is easier that portal and much more fun to play. Many more gameplay mechanics, and new tricks all add to the fun :). bought this for my friend so that we could play together.

Amazing game! Amazing story, amazing music, amazing characters and of course amazing puzzle mechanics! It may cost twice as much as Portal 1, but it's definitely worth it! Way longer story mode and lots of replay value with the co-op mode and the steam workshop! I Highly recommend this game, especially if you LOVED Portal 1!

Una obra maestra, sin lugar a dudas el mejor juego de Valve. Un genial juego de puzles continuacion del primero que nos adentra en la historia de Aperture. Gran historia, gran jugabilidad y puzles de logica. Sin duda lo recomiendo.

Billy Rivers AKA Downy не смог закончить его, поэтому он получил отрицательный отзыв, во-первых, Билли играл в игру, пока он не зацепился за его хлам, а затем широко распахнулся и быстро сосал, пока его яйца не были такими маленькими, В ловушке бесконечной петли сухих рек BILLY AKA DOWNY SCREAMS «НЕ ПРОДОЛЖАЕТСЯ». Он понял, что играет в портал и пытается телепортировать ........................ Это не закончилось хорошо, и он начал интенсивно лизать свою булочку, пока не пробилось дырявое гигантское отверстие, кровоточащее и извергающееся повсюду.

剛開始是玩了一局單人主線，一直耍蠢不知道自己在幹嘛，覺得這傳送門的設計真的很前衛，空間錯亂到不能玩太久，會很眼花，後面跟朋友一起玩合作，因為也沒先玩單人，解超久可是破關很有成就感，把合作六關+番外都解完之後，跑回去完第一代單機劇情，覺得製造商超惡搞很好笑，一二代劇情有連貫，玩完第一代在玩第二代，真的覺得遊戲製作真的很用心，第二代的場景更宏大，真的很多關要多觀察，玩完只有爽，雖然只有自己跟機器人，剛開始玩的時候真的很怕那種末世的環境，後面就覺得機器人越來越有人性，又ㄎㄧㄤ的滿可愛的，接下來還要在摸索一下其他的東西，總之推推推推推～
天啊总算不晕了，故事有趣，结尾歌不错，好评。

I really don't like first-person anything but I was shocked when I started playing Portal 2 (I didn't even know what it was and I hadn't played the original one). I guess a part of it is anxiety in traditional FPS games since there are people running and shooting but it is definitely not like that here. The concept was ahead of its time and it's quite unique to those who don't quite relate to the term "gamer". Plus, who doesn't love a good puzzle with some iconic punchlines and the promise of cake?

Iniciei o jogo sem muitas expectativas, acreditava que o povo exagerava quando se referiam a este game, mas confesso que fui surpreendido.
O game se passa no mesmo mundo de half life e tem o seu grande forte em um game play épico e muito engraçado, com quebra-cabeças relativamente desafiadores mas que não se tornam monótonos, isso graças aos robôs Wheatley e Glados que estão sempre nos entretendo e rendendo boas risadas, ambos personagens muito bem trabalhados por sinal.
O enredo é muito bom, com desfechos interessantes, porém, achei um pouco previsível; mas isso não diminui a grandiosidade desse jogo. 
Recomendo muitíssimo que zerem primeiro o Portal e em seguida joguem Portal 2 para uma experiência mais completa. Sem dúvida alguma uma das melhores compras que fiz na Steam.

通关此游戏的心路历程：
刚进游戏：我是谁？我从哪里来？我要到哪里去?
熟悉基本操作后：还行可以驾驭。
摸索较复杂操作过关后：还有这种操作？
逐渐熟悉一些套路后：应该稳了吧....
出现新道具后：还可以这样玩？

卡关：不行，必须怼过关。
过关后：感觉身体被掏空....
.................................分界线...........................................
大约八小时通关由于没有玩过portal 1，或许走了不少弯路，（开始玩的时候不知道干啥，懵逼了好久...）但是感觉一点都不亏。
的确是值得花时间去玩的游戏。即使卡几十分钟的关，在过关后换取那片刻的喜悦也是值得的。

总的来看，游戏有部分关卡难度较大，但并非难到让人毫无思路，仔细琢磨还是可以过的（卡关时多观察发现有用的东西并加以利用，尤其是可以放传送门的白墙，它引导你找到通关的思路，例如斜面上的白墙往往可以拿来当做跳到高处远处的跳板。）
游戏良心地将难度层次化，开始让你适应，当你自认为得心应手，再加大难度或引入新道具，避免你失去兴趣，也不会因为一下过难而放弃，同时秀一波制作人的脑洞....

剧情方面开始可能看得有点懵逼，到后面自然就明白了。。还是相当有意思的。
顺便一提结尾GLaDOS的歌我觉得很赞！

如果你是在评论区思索要不要入手此游戏，我只能说原价买了游戏后肯定不后悔，打折买稳赚不亏啊！

Tak som to nedávno s pomocou božou konečne dohral. Pocity? Dosť zmiešané, keďže Wheatley sa vás najprv snaží zachrániť, potom odrovná GLaDOS, ktorá sa mu chce pomstiť za to, že je prototyp prvotriedneho idiota. Takže nastáva úžasný zlom a tá, ktorá vás chcela zničiť sa napokon stáva vašou najlepšou priateľkou. Celkovo som ostal užasnutý príbehom hry, dejové zvraty sú naozaj nečakané a tentoraz si tu už naozaj solídne potrápite mozgy, hoci pri Wheatleyho testovacích miestnostiach vám asi občas ostane rozum stáť a začnete sa rovnako ako GLaDOS utvrdzovať v tom, že je to naozaj riadny kretén (smiech). Plus poteší možnosť vytvárať si vlastné miestnosti a potrápiť aj iných hráčov, ktorý sa k vaším dielam dostanú cez workshop. Za seba opäť hodnotím hru ako špičkovo spracovanú, ako graficky, tak príbehovo a tiež aj ohľadom hrateľnosti. Takisto veľký lajk u mňa má hudba a už tradične záverečný soundtrack naspievaný GLaDOS. Vrelo odporúčam, 10/10, nemá chybu, stojí za útratu...
